name: Donkey Kong (Original)
description:
NOTE: Please play in Full Screen mode.

A short remake of the original arcade game, Donkey Kong (1981).

Controls

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump

----------

Written in C# with Unity.

Art: 

SFX: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-retro-sfx-pack-43256#d...
